00036 import gtk
00037 import cairo
00038 import pango
00039 import math

00043 ########################################################################
00044 # Math utilities.
00045 
00046 
00047 PI = math.pi
00048 TwoPI = 2.0 * PI
00049 
00050 Cos = math.cos
00051 Sin = math.sin
00052 Atan2 = math.atan2
00053 Sqrt = math.sqrt
00054 
00055 
00056 def Floor(val):
00057     return int(math.floor(val))
00058 
00059 def Ceil(val):
00060     return int(math.ceil(val))
00061 
00062 def Round(val):
00063     return Floor(val + 0.5)
00064 
00065 
00066 def DegToRad(deg):
00067     return (TwoPI * deg) / 360.0
00068 
00069 
00070 def RadToDeg(rad):
00071     return (360.0 * rad) / TwoPI
00072 
00073 
00074 def NormalizeAngleRad(ang):
00075 
00076     while ang < 0:
00077         ang += TwoPI
00078 
00079     while ang >= TwoPI:
00080         ang -= TwoPI
00081 
00082     return ang
00083 
00084 
00085 ########################################################################
00086 # Font cache.
00087 
00088 
00089 FontCache = {}
00090 
00091 def GetFont(s):
00092 
00093     if FontCache.has_key(s):
00094         return FontCache[s]
00095 
00096     descr = pango.FontDescription(s)
00097 
00098     FontCache[s] = descr
00099 
00100     return descr
00101 
00102 
00103 ########################################################################
00104 # Image cache.
00105 
00106 
00107 ImageCache = {}
00108 
00109 def GetImage(s):
00110    
00111     if ImageCache.has_key(s):
00112         return ImageCache[s]
00113    
00114     image = None
00115    
00116     if s[-4:].lower() == '.png':
00117         try:
00118             image = cairo.ImageSurface.create_from_png(s)
00119         except: pass
00120     elif s[-4:].lower() == '.svg':
00121         try:
00122             # FIXME: read SVG into image
00123             print "SVG images not supported yet:", s
00124         except: pass
00125     else:
00126         print "Don't know how to load image file type:", s
00127    
00128     if image:
00129         ImageCache[s] = image
00130    
00131     return image

00140     def __init__(
00141             self,
00142             label=None,
00143             description=None,
00144             action=None,
00145             x=0,
00146             y=0,
00147             width=0,
00148             height=0,
00149             labelFont='Sans 14',
00150             labelPadding=2,
00151             labelXAdjust=0,
00152             labelYAdjust=2,
00153             icon=None,
00154             iconHilite=None,
00155             iconPadding=2,
00156             iconSide='top',
00157             visible=True,
00158             pie=None,
00159             subPie=None,
00160             fixedRadius=0,
00161             linear=False,
00162             linearDirection='down',
00163             linearOrderReversed=False,
00164             linearGap=0,
00165             hiliteFillColor=(1, 1, 0),
00166             hiliteStrokeColor=(0, 0, 1),
00167             hiliteTextColor=(0, 0, 1),
00168             loliteFillColor=(1, 1, 1),
00169             loliteStrokeColor=(0, 0, 0),
00170             loliteTextColor=(0, 0, 0),
00171             **args):
00172 
00173         #print "PIEITEM INIT", self, label, args
00174         self.label = label
00175         self.description = description
00176         self.action = action
00177         self.x = x
00178         self.y = y
00179         self.width = width

00182         self.labelPadding = labelPadding
00183         self.labelXAdjust = labelXAdjust
00184         self.labelYAdjust = labelYAdjust
00185         self.icon = icon
00186         self.iconHilite = iconHilite
00187         self.iconPadding = iconPadding
00188         self.iconSide = iconSide
00189         self.visible = visible
00190         self.pie = None # Added later.
00191         self.subPie = subPie
00192         self.fixedRadius = fixedRadius
00193         self.linear = linear
00194         self.linearDirection = linearDirection
00195         self.linearOrderReversed = linearOrderReversed
00196         self.linearGap = linearGap
00197         self.hiliteFillColor = hiliteFillColor
00198         self.hiliteStrokeColor = hiliteStrokeColor
00199         self.hiliteTextColor = hiliteTextColor
00200         self.loliteFillColor = loliteFillColor
00201         self.loliteStrokeColor = loliteStrokeColor
00202         self.loliteTextColor = loliteTextColor
00203

00205         self.index = -1
00206         self.dx = 0
00207         self.dy = 0
00208         self.enterTime = 0

00210         self.totalTime = 0
00211         self.finalX = 0
00212         self.finalY = 0
00213         self.ringIndex = None
00214         self.angle = 0

00217         self.edge1Angle = 0
00218         self.edge2Dx = 0
00219         self.edge2Dy = 0
00220         self.edge2Angle = 0
00221         self.labelX = 0
00222         self.labelY = 0
00223         self.labelWidth = 0
00224         self.labelHeight = 0
00225         self.iconX = 0
00226         self.iconY = 0
00227         self.iconWidth = 0
00228         self.iconHeight = 0
00229 
00230         if pie != None:
00231             pie.addItem(self)

00234     def measure(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00235 
00236         label = self.label
00237 
00238         width = 0
00239         height = 0
00240 
00241         labelX = 0
00242         labelY = 0
00243         labelWidth = 0
00244         labelHeight = 0
00245 
00246         iconX = 0
00247         iconY = 0
00248         iconWidth = 0
00249         iconHeight = 0
00250 
00251         labelPadding = self.labelPadding
00252         iconPadding = self.iconPadding
00253 
00254         if label != None:
00255 
00256             font = GetFont(self.labelFont)
00257 
00258             playout.set_font_description(font)
00259             playout.set_markup(label)
00260             labelWidth, labelHeight = playout.get_pixel_size()
00261 
00262             labelWidth += 2 * labelPadding
00263             labelHeight += 2 * labelPadding
00264 
00265         icon = self.icon
00266 
00267         if icon != None:
00268 
00269             image = GetImage(icon)
00270             if image:
00271 
00272                 iconWidth = image.get_width()
00273                 iconHeight = image.get_height()
00274 
00275                 iconWidth += 2 * iconPadding
00276                 iconHeight += 2 * iconPadding
00277 
00278         if not label:
00279             if not icon:
00280                 # No icon, no label.
00281                 pass
00282             else:
00283                 # Just an icon.
00284                 width = iconWidth
00285                 height = iconHeight
00286                 iconX = iconPadding
00287                 iconY = iconPadding
00288         else:
00289             if not icon:
00290                 # Just a label.
00291                 width = labelWidth
00292                 height = labelHeight
00293                 labelX = labelPadding
00294                 labelY = labelPadding
00295             else:
00296                 # Icon and label.
00297                 iconSide = self.iconSide
00298                 if iconSide in ('n', 'up', 'top'):
00299                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00300                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00301                     iconX = Floor(((width - iconWidth) / 2) + iconPadding)
00302                     iconY = iconPadding
00303                     labelX = Floor(((width - labelWidth) / 2) + labelPadding)
00304                     labelY = iconHeight + labelPadding
00305                 elif iconSide in ('nw', 'topleft'):
00306                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00307                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00308                     iconX = iconPadding
00309                     iconY = iconPadding
00310                     labelX = labelPadding
00311                     labelY = iconHeight + labelPadding
00312                 elif iconSide in ('ne', 'topright'):
00313                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00314                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00315                     iconX = width - iconWidth + iconPadding
00316                     iconY = iconPadding
00317                     labelX = width - labelWidth + labelPadding
00318                     labelY = iconHeight + labelPadding
00319                 elif iconSide in ('s', 'down', 'bottom'):
00320                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00321                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00322                     labelX = Floor(((width - labelWidth) / 2) + labelPadding)
00323                     labelY = labelPadding
00324                     iconX = Floor(((width - iconWidth) / 2) + iconPadding)
00325                     iconY = labelHeight + iconPadding
00326                 elif iconSide in ('sw', 'bottomleft'):
00327                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00328                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00329                     labelX = labelPadding
00330                     labelY = labelPadding
00331                     iconX = iconPadding
00332                     iconY = labelHeight + iconPadding
00333                 elif iconSide in ('se', 'bottomright'):
00334                     width = max(labelWidth, iconWidth)
00335                     height = labelHeight + iconHeight
00336                     labelX = width - labelWidth + labelPadding
00337                     labelY = labelPadding
00338                     iconX = width - iconWidth + iconPadding
00339                     iconY = labelHeight + iconPadding
00340                 elif iconSide in ('w', 'left'):
00341                     width = labelWidth + iconWidth
00342                     height = max(labelHeight, iconHeight)
00343                     iconX = iconPadding
00344                     iconY = Floor(((height - iconHeight) / 2) + iconPadding)
00345                     labelX = iconWidth + labelPadding
00346                     labelY = Floor(((height - labelHeight) / 2) + labelPadding)
00347                 elif iconSide in ('e', 'right'):
00348                     width = labelWidth + iconWidth
00349                     height = max(labelHeight, iconHeight)
00350                     labelX = labelPadding
00351                     labelY = Floor(((height - labelHeight) / 2) + labelPadding)
00352                     iconX = labelWidth + iconPadding
00353                     iconY = Floor(((height - iconHeight) / 2) + iconPadding)
00354                 else:
00355                     print "Invalid iconSide: " + repr(iconSide)
00356 
00357         self.width = width
00358         self.height = height
00359 
00360         self.labelX = labelX
00361         self.labelY = labelY
00362         self.labelWidth = labelWidth
00363         self.labelHeight = labelHeight
00364 
00365         self.iconX = iconX
00366         self.iconY = iconY
00367         self.iconWidth = iconWidth
00368         self.iconHeight = iconHeight
00369 
00370 
00371     def layoutPie(self, radius):
00372 
00373         if self.fixedRadius > 0:
00374             radius = self.fixedRadius;
00375 
00376         gap = 1
00377         rdx = radius * self.dx
00378         rdy = radius * self.dy
00379 
00380         # Special cases for top, bottom, left, and right
00381         if Round(rdx) == 0: # top or bottom
00382             rdx -= (self.width / 2.0) + 1
00383             if rdy > 0:
00384                 rdy += gap - 3; # top
00385             else:
00386                 rdy -= self.height + gap - 2; # bottom
00387         else:
00388             if Round(rdy) == 0: # left or right
00389                 rdy -= (self.height / 2.0) + 0.5
00390                 if rdx < 0:
00391                     rdx -= self.width + gap - 2
00392                 else:
00393                     rdx += gap - 3
00394             else: # everwhere else
00395                 # Justify the label according to its quadrant.
00396                 fudge = 2
00397 
00398                 if rdx < 0:
00399                     rdx -= self.width - fudge
00400                 else:
00401                     rdx -= fudge
00402 
00403                 if rdy < 0:
00404                     rdy -= self.height - fudge
00405                 else:
00406                     rdy -= fudge
00407 
00408         self.x = Round(rdx)
00409         self.y = Round(rdy)
00410 
00411 
00412     def layoutLinear(self, minX, minY, maxX, maxY):
00413         pie = self.pie
00414 
00415         linearDirection = self.linearDirection
00416         if ((linearDirection == None) or
00417             (linearDirection == "")):
00418             linearDirection = self.pie.linearDirection
00419 
00420         pie = self.pie
00421         gap = self.linearGap
00422         xCenterOffset = 0
00423         yCenterOffset = 0
00424 
00425         if linearDirection in ('c', 'center'):
00426             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 'center')
00427             xCenterOffset = Floor((self.width / -2.0) - 1) # TODO: Explain what this -1 fudge is for!
00428             yCenterOffset = Floor(self.height / -2.0)
00429         elif linearDirection in ('e', 'right'):
00430             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 0)
00431             if otherItem:
00432                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x + otherItem.width + gap)
00433                 yCenterOffset = Floor(self.height / -2.0)
00434             else:
00435                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00436                 return
00437         elif linearDirection in ('ne', 'topright'):
00438             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 45)
00439             if otherItem:
00440                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x + otherItem.width + gap)
00441                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y + otherItem.height - self.height)
00442             else:
00443                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00444                 return
00445         elif linearDirection in ('se', 'bottomright'):
00446             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 315)
00447             if otherItem:
00448                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x + otherItem.width + gap)
00449                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y)
00450             else:
00451                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00452                 return
00453         elif linearDirection in ('w', 'left'):
00454             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 180)
00455             if otherItem:
00456                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x - self.width - gap)
00457                 yCenterOffset = Floor(self.height / -2.0)
00458             else:
00459                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00460                 return
00461         elif linearDirection in ('nw', 'topleft'):
00462             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 135)
00463             if otherItem:
00464                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x - otherItem.width - gap)
00465                 yCenterOffset = Floor((otherItem.y + otherItem.height - self.height))
00466             else:
00467                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00468                 return
00469         elif linearDirection in ('sw', 'bottomleft'):
00470             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 225)
00471             if otherItem:
00472                 xCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.x - self.width - gap)
00473                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y)
00474             else:
00475                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00476                 return
00477         elif linearDirection in ('n', 'up', 'top'):
00478             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 90)
00479             if otherItem:
00480                 xCenterOffset = Floor((self.width / -2.0) - 1)
00481                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y - self.height - gap)
00482             else:
00483                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00484                 return
00485         elif linearDirection in ('s', 'down', 'bottom'):
00486             otherItem = pie.addItemDirection(self, 270)
00487             if otherItem:
00488                 xCenterOffset = Floor((self.width / -2.0) - 1)
00489                 yCenterOffset = Floor(otherItem.y + otherItem.height + gap)
00490             else:
00491                 self.layoutPie(pie.radius)
00492                 return
00493 
00494         self.x = Round(xCenterOffset)
00495         self.y = Round(yCenterOffset)
00496 
00497         self.ringIndex = None
00498 
00499 
00500     def itemsOverlap(self, item, fringe=2):
00501 
00502         myLeft = self.x - fringe
00503         myRight = self.x + self.width + fringe
00504         yourLeft = item.x - fringe
00505         yourRight = item.x + item.width + fringe
00506         myTop = self.y - fringe
00507         myBottom = self.y + self.height + fringe
00508         yourTop = item.y - fringe
00509         yourBottom = item.y + item.height + fringe
00510 
00511         return ((myBottom > yourTop) and
00512                 (myTop < yourBottom) and
00513                 (myRight > yourLeft) and
00514                 (myLeft < yourRight))
00515 
00516 
00517     def draw(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00518 
00519         x = self.x
00520         y = self.y
00521         width = self.width
00522         height = self.height
00523 
00524         hilited = self.index == self.pie.curItem
00525 
00526         if hilited:
00527             fillColor = self.hiliteFillColor
00528             strokeColor = self.hiliteStrokeColor
00529             textColor = self.hiliteTextColor
00530         else:
00531             fillColor = self.loliteFillColor
00532             strokeColor = self.loliteStrokeColor
00533             textColor = self.loliteTextColor
00534 
00535         if fillColor or strokeColor:
00536 
00537             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
00538 
00539             if fillColor:
00540                 context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
00541                 if strokeColor:
00542                     context.fill_preserve()
00543                 else:
00544                     context.fill()
00545 
00546             if strokeColor:
00547                 context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
00548                 context.stroke()
00549 
00550         label = self.label
00551         if textColor and (label != None):
00552 
00553             context.set_source_rgb(*textColor)
00554 
00555             font = GetFont(self.labelFont)
00556 
00557             playout.set_font_description(font)
00558             playout.set_markup(label)
00559 
00560             context.move_to(
00561                 x + self.labelX,
00562                 y + self.labelY)
00563 
00564             context.show_layout(playout)
00565 
00566         hilited = self.index == self.pie.curItem
00567         if hilited:
00568             icon = self.iconHilite or self.icon
00569         else:
00570             icon = self.icon
00571 
00572         if icon:
00573 
00574             image = GetImage(icon)
00575             if image:
00576 
00577                 context.set_source_surface(
00578                     image,
00579                     x + self.iconX,
00580                     y + self.iconY)
00581 
00582                 context.paint()
00583

00734         self.footerPadding = footerPadding
00735         self.footerMargin = footerMargin
00736         self.footerGap = footerGap
00737         self.footerXAdjust = footerXAdjust
00738         self.footerYAdjust = footerYAdjust
00739         self.footerFixedHeight = footerFixedHeight
00740         self.footerDescriptions = footerDescriptions
00741         self.clockwise = clockwise
00742         self.initialAngle = initialAngle
00743         self.fixedRadius = fixedRadius
00744         self.minRadius = minRadius
00745         self.maxRadius = maxRadius
00746         self.extraRadius = extraRadius
00747         self.labelGapRadius = labelGapRadius
00748         self.marginRadius = marginRadius
00749         self.radiusNotch = radiusNotch
00750         self.showBackground = showBackground
00751         self.backgroundImage = backgroundImage
00752         self.border = border
00753         self.overlapFringe = overlapFringe
00754         self.maxPieItems = maxPieItems
00755         self.pieSlice = pieSlice
00756         self.linear = linear
00757         self.linearDirection = linearDirection
00758         self.linearOrderReversed = linearOrderReversed
00759         self.transparentItems = transparentItems
00760         self.itemBorder = itemBorder
00761         self.itemMargin = itemMargin
00762         self.itemWidth = itemWidth
00763         self.itemHeight = itemHeight
00764         self.centerMargin = centerMargin
00765         self.centerBorderWidth = centerBorderWidth
00766         self.centerVisible = centerVisible
00767         self.parentPie = parentPie
00768         self.parentItem = parentItem
00769 
00770         self.radius = 0
00771         self.centerX = 0
00772         self.centerY = 0
00773         self.innerRadius = 0
00774         self.headerX = 0
00775         self.headerY = 0
00776         self.headerWidth = 0
00777         self.headerHeight = 0
00778         self.footerX = 0
00779         self.footerY = 0
00780         self.footerWidth = 0
00781         self.footerHeight = 0
00782         self.curX = -1
00783         self.curY = -1
00784         self.lastX = -1
00785         self.lastY = -1
00786         self.mouseDeltaX = 0
00787         self.mouseDeltaY = 0
00788         self.direction = 0
00789         self.distance = 0
00790         self.items = []
00791         self.visibleItems = []
00792         self.pieRings = []
00793         self.pieItems = []
00794         self.linearItems = []
00795         self.itemDirections = {}
00796         self.item = None
00797         self.curRingIndex = 0
00798         self.curItem = -1
00799         self.lastItem = -1
00800         self.valid = False
00801         self.minX = 0
00802         self.maxX = 0
00803         self.minY = 0
00804         self.maxY = 0
00805         self.trackingFlag = False
00806         self.centerX = 0
00807         self.centerY = 0
00808         self.pinned = False
00809         self.winX = 0
00810         self.winY = 0
00811         self.winWidth = 1
00812         self.winHeight = 1
00813         self.x = 0
00814         self.y = 0
00815         self.width = 1
00816         self.height = 1
00817 
00818 
00819     def addItem(self, item):
00820 
00821         item.pie = self
00822         self.items.append(item)
00823         self.invalidate()
00824 
00825 
00826     def invalidate(self):
00827 
00828         self.valid = False
00829 
00830 
00831     def validate(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00832 
00833         print "VALIDATE", self.valid
00834 
00835         if self.valid:
00836             return
00837 
00838         self.valid = True
00839 
00840         self.layout(context, pcontext, playout)
00841 
00842 
00843     def addItemDirection(self, item, deg):
00844 
00845         # Add an item to the map of directions to items in that direction.
00846         # Also set the item's dx and dy. Not sure why that's here.
00847 
00848         if deg == "center":
00849             dx = 0
00850             dy = 0
00851         else:
00852             angle = DegToRad(deg)
00853             deg = Round(RadToDeg(NormalizeAngleRad(angle)))
00854             dx = Cos(angle)
00855             dy = -Sin(angle)
00856 
00857         item.dx = dx
00858         item.dy = dy
00859 
00860         lastItem = None
00861 
00862         a = self.itemDirections.get(deg, None)
00863         if not a:
00864             a = []
00865             self.itemDirections[deg] = a
00866         else:
00867             lastItem = a[-1]
00868 
00869         a.append(item)
00870 
00871         return lastItem
00872 
00873 
00874     def layout(self, context, pcontext, playout):
00875 
00876         print "PieMenu layout", self, context, pcontext, playout
00877 
00878         # Just the visible items.
00879         visibleItems = []
00880         self.visibleItems = visibleItems
00881 
00882         # The pie rings.
00883         pieRings = []
00884         self.pieRings = pieRings
00885 
00886         # Just the visible pie menus items.
00887         pieItems = []
00888         self.pieItems = pieItems
00889 
00890         # Just the visible linear menu items.
00891         linearItems = []
00892         self.linearItems = linearItems
00893 
00894         # Map of item direction to array of items in that direction.
00895         # Note: Think about how this interacts with rings and linear menu items.
00896         itemDirections = {}
00897         self.itemDirections = itemDirections
00898 
00899         # Put just the visible items from items into the visibleItems array.
00900         visibleItems = [
00901             item
00902             for item in self.items
00903             if item.visible
00904         ]
00905         self.visibleItems = visibleItems
00906 
00907         # Count the visible items.
00908         itemCount = len(visibleItems)
00909 
00910         # We're done if no items.
00911         if itemCount == 0:
00912             return
00913 
00914         # Initialize constants and variables for layout.
00915 
00916         overlapFringe = self.overlapFringe
00917         pieSlice = self.pieSlice
00918 
00919         maxPieItems = self.maxPieItems
00920         if maxPieItems == None:
00921             maxPieItems = [1.0e+6]
00922         elif type(maxPieItems) not in (type(()), type([])):
00923             maxPieItems = [maxPieItems]
00924 
00925         maxPieItemsTotal = 0
00926         for i in maxPieItems:
00927             maxPieItemsTotal += i
00928 
00929         # Categorize items into pieItems and linearItems arrays.
00930         itemIndex = 0
00931         pieItemCount = 0
00932         maxRingItems = maxPieItems[0]
00933         for item in visibleItems:
00934 
00935           item.index = itemIndex
00936           itemIndex += 1
00937           item.valid = False
00938 
00939           # Limit the number of pie items to maxPieItemsTotal.
00940           # Classify overflow items as linear.
00941           if pieItemCount >= maxPieItemsTotal:
00942               item.linear = True
00943 
00944           if item.linear:
00945               # Handle reverse ordering linear items.
00946               if item.linearOrderReversed:
00947                   # Prepend the linear item to the beginning of the linearItems array.
00948                   linearItems.insert(0, item)
00949               else:
00950                   # Append the linear item to the end of the linearItems array.
00951                   linearItems.append(item)
00952           else:
00953               # If this is the first item, then make the first ring.
00954               if len(pieRings) == 0:
00955                   pieRings.append(pieItems)
00956 
00957               # If this item will overflow the current ring, then make a new ring.
00958               if len(pieItems) >= maxRingItems:
00959                   pieItems = []
00960                   pieRings.append(pieItems)
00961                   ringIndex = len(pieRings) - 1
00962                   if ringIndex < len(maxPieItems):
00963                       maxRingItems = maxPieItems[ringIndex]
00964                   else:
00965                       print "Layout error: too many pie items, maxPieItems array did not add up right."
00966 
00967               # Append the pie item to the end of the pieItems array.
00968               pieItems.append(item)
00969               pieItemCount += 1
00970 
00971         # Measure the items.
00972         for item in self.items:
00973             item.x = 0
00974             item.y = 0
00975             item.measure(context, pcontext, playout)
00976 
00977         ringCount = len(pieRings)
00978         linearItemCount = len(linearItems)
00979 
00980         # If there are any pie items, then calculate the pie menu parameters.
00981         if ringCount > 0:
00982 
00983             pieSubtend = TwoPI
00984             if pieSlice:
00985                 pieSubtend *= pieSlice
00986 
00987             ringIndex = 0
00988             for ringItems in pieRings:
00989 
00990                 ringItemCount = len(ringItems)
00991 
00992                 # Calculate the subtend, angle, cosine, sine, quadrant, slope,
00993                 # and size of each pie menu item.
00994 
00995                 # Calculate twist, the angular width of each slice.
00996                 twist = pieSubtend / ringItemCount
00997 
00998                 # Twist the other way if clockwise.
00999                 ringClockwise = self.getRingClockwise(ringIndex)
01000                 if ringClockwise:
01001                     twist = -twist
01002 
01003                 # Point ang towards the center of the first slice,
01004                 # or the edge of the first slice, for non-zero pieSlice.
01005 
01006                 ringInitialAngle = self.getRingInitialAngle(ringIndex)
01007                 ang = DegToRad(ringInitialAngle)
01008 
01009                 if pieSlice == 0:
01010                     # Twist backwards half a slice, to the edge of the slice.
01011                     ang -= twist / 2.0
01012 
01013                 # Now calculate the size and other properties of the pie items.
01014                 for item in ringItems:
01015 
01016                     # Calculate angle, the center of the current slice.
01017                     angle = ang + (twist / 2.0)
01018 
01019                     # Add self item to the piemenu's list of items in the same direction.
01020                     self.addItemDirection(item, RadToDeg(angle))
01021 
01022                     # Calculate the unit vectors of the slice edge directions.
01023                     # Calculate ang in the upside-down coordinate system, for drawing.
01024                     item.ringIndex = ringIndex
01025                     item.angle = ang
01026                     item.edge1Dx = Cos(ang)
01027                     item.edge1Dy = -Sin(ang)
01028                     item.edge1Angle = Atan2(item.edge1Dy, item.edge1Dx)
01029                     item.edge2Dx = Cos(ang + twist)
01030                     item.edge2Dy = -Sin(ang + twist)
01031                     item.edge2Angle = Atan2(item.edge2Dy, item.edge2Dx)
01032 
01033                     # Twist ang around to the edge of the next slice.
01034                     ang += twist
01035 
01036                 ringIndex += 1
01037 
01038         # Determine the radius for the inner ring.
01039         fixedRadius = self.fixedRadius
01040 
01041         labelGapRadius = self.labelGapRadius
01042 
01043         # If the radius is not fixed, then calculate it dynamically.
01044         if fixedRadius > 0:
01045 
01046             # Use the fixed radius that has been specified.
01047             radius = fixedRadius
01048            
01049         else:
01050 
01051             # Start with the minRadius.
01052             radius = self.minRadius
01053 
01054             # If there are any pie items, then make sure they don't overlap.
01055             if ringCount > 0:
01056 
01057                 # Only apply this to the inner ring of the pie menu, for now.
01058                 # The outer rings will each be a fixed ringRadius thick.
01059                 # I think it's better to have explicit control over the
01060                 # inner fixedRadius and outer ringRadius, so designers can
01061                 # tune it to be easy to use, instead of leaving it up to the
01062                 # label layout algorithm to determine (which could badly effect usability).
01063                 # Otherwise pie menus would be too big and the ring sizes would be irregular.
01064                 # Could implement an array of ringRadius numbers to explicitly control
01065                 # the radius of each ring, but that seems control-freakish, so not yet.
01066 
01067                 ringItems = pieRings[0]
01068 
01069                 # Increase the radius until there are no overlaps between
01070                 # any pie items.
01071                 # Start by wrapping last around to the end of the
01072                 # circular menu.
01073 
01074                 # Last index and last pie item, used to test for overlap.
01075                 # Only test for last item overlap if more than one pie item.
01076                 lastIndex = len(ringItems) - 1
01077                 last = None
01078                 if lastIndex > 0:
01079                     last = ringItems[lastIndex]
01080 
01081                 # Loop over all pie items testing for overlap with last adjacent
01082                 # pie item.
01083                 for item in ringItems:
01084 
01085                     # Ignore fixedRadius items.
01086                     # XXX: The behavior of mixing adjacent fixedRadius and not
01087                     # fixedRadius pie menu items is not well defined.
01088                     # XXX: fixedRadius should be inherited from the piemenu.
01089                     if item.fixedRadius > 0:
01090                         continue
01091 
01092                     # Push the radius out until there are no overlaps.
01093                     # Give up after a while.
01094                     maxLoops = 200
01095                     radiusNotch = self.radiusNotch
01096 
01097                     for loopCount in range(maxLoops):
01098 
01099                         # Lay out the item at the current radius.
01100                         item.layoutPie(radius + labelGapRadius)
01101 
01102                         # If there is only one item, then we're done pushing out.
01103                         if last == None:
01104                             # Done pushing out.
01105                             break
01106 
01107                         # If there are more than one pie items, then test for adjacent overlaps.
01108                         # Lay out the last item at the current radius.
01109                         last.layoutPie(radius + labelGapRadius)
01110 
01111                         # Test for overlap. Takes two to tango.
01112                         if not item.itemsOverlap(last, overlapFringe):
01113                             # They don't overlap, so we're done pushing out.
01114                             break
01115 
01116                         # The two adjacent labels overlap, so we keep looping and
01117                         # pushing them out until they don't.
01118 
01119                         # Bump the radiusNotch.
01120                         radius += radiusNotch
01121 
01122                     last = item
01123 
01124             # Add in the extra radius.
01125             radius += self.extraRadius
01126 
01127         # Done calculating the radius.
01128         self.radius = radius
01129 
01130         ringRadius = self.ringRadius
01131         outerRingRadius = radius + ((len(pieRings) - 1) * ringRadius)
01132 
01133         # Calculate the bounding box of the items, as we lay them out.
01134         maxX = -1000000
01135         minX = 1000000
01136         maxY = -1000000
01137         minY = 1000000
01138 
01139         if ringCount > 0:
01140             # If there are any pie items, then make sure the bounding box
01141             # encompasses the radius.
01142             minX = -outerRingRadius
01143             minY = -outerRingRadius
01144             maxX = outerRingRadius
01145             maxY = outerRingRadius
01146 
01147         # Calculate the maximum radius (squared).
01148         maxRadius = 0
01149 
01150         # Loop over the pie items, and calculate their bounding box
01151         # and maxRadius.
01152 
01153         ringIndex = 0
01154         for ringItems in pieRings:
01155            
01156             for item in ringItems:
01157 
01158                 # Lay out the pie item at the current radius.
01159                 item.layoutPie(
01160                     radius + (ringIndex * ringRadius) + labelGapRadius)
01161 
01162                 # Calculate the corners of the item bounding box.
01163                 itw = item.width
01164                 ith = item.height
01165                 itx0 = item.x
01166                 ity0 = item.y
01167                 itx1 = itx0 + itw
01168                 ity1 = ity0 + ith
01169 
01170                 # Update the bounding box.
01171                 if itx0 < minX:
01172                     minX = itx0
01173                 if ity0 < minY:
01174                     minY = ity0
01175                 if itx1 > maxX:
01176                     maxX = itx1
01177                 if ity1 > maxY:
01178                     maxY = ity1
01179 
01180                 # Update the maxRadius.
01181                 farx = max(abs(itx0), abs(itx1))
01182                 fary = max(abs(ity0), abs(ity1))
01183                 rad = (farx * farx) + (fary * fary)
01184 
01185                 if rad > self.maxRadius:
01186                     maxRadius = rad;
01187 
01188             ringIndex += 1
01189 
01190         # Loop over the linear items, lay them out,
01191         # and calculate their bounding box and maxRadius.
01192 
01193         # Calculate the max width of the north and south linear items.
01194         maxItemWidthNorth = 0
01195         maxItemWidthSouth = 0
01196 
01197         for item in linearItems:
01198           # Lay out the linear item.
01199           item.layoutLinear(
01200               minX,
01201               minY,
01202               maxX,
01203               maxY)
01204 
01205           # Calculate the max vertical item width.
01206           if abs(item.dx) < 0.01:
01207               if item.dy < 0:
01208                   if item.width > maxItemWidthNorth:
01209                       maxItemWidthNorth = item.width
01210                       #print "maxItemWidthNorth", maxItemWidthNorth
01211               else:
01212                   if item.width > maxItemWidthSouth:
01213                       maxItemWidthSouth = item.width
01214                       #print "maxItemWidthSouth", maxItemWidthSouth
01215 
01216           # Calculate the corners of the item bounding box.
01217           itw = item.width
01218           ith = item.height
01219           itx0 = item.x
01220           ity0 = item.y
01221           itx1 = itx0 + itw
01222           ity1 = ity0 + ith
01223 
01224           # Update the bounding box.
01225           if itx0 < minX:
01226               minX = itx0
01227           if ity0 < minY:
01228               minY = ity0
01229           if itx1 > maxX:
01230               maxX = itx1
01231           if ity1 > maxY:
01232               maxY = ity1
01233 
01234           # Update the maxRadius.
01235           farx = max(abs(itx0), abs(itx1))
01236           fary = max(abs(ity0), abs(ity1))
01237           rad = (farx * farx) + (fary * fary)
01238           if rad > maxRadius:
01239               maxRadius = rad;
01240 
01241         # Go over the linear items and fix the x and width of all vertical items.
01242         for item in linearItems:
01243           #print "item.dx", item.dx, item
01244           if abs(item.dx) < 0.01:
01245               w = 0
01246               if item.dy < 0:
01247                   w = maxItemWidthNorth
01248               else:
01249                   w = maxItemWidthSouth
01250 
01251               item.width = w
01252               item.x = Round((-0.5 * w) - 1)
01253 
01254         # Calculate the maxRadius.
01255         maxRadius = Floor(
01256             0.95 +
01257             Sqrt(maxRadius) +
01258             self.marginRadius)
01259         self.maxRadius = maxRadius
01260 
01261         # Expand the bounding box by the border.
01262         border = self.border
01263         minX -= border
01264         minY -= border
01265         maxX += border
01266         maxY += border
01267 
01268         # Expand the bounding box to integers.
01269         minX = Floor(minX)
01270         minY = Floor(minY)
01271         maxX = Ceil(maxX)
01272         maxY = Ceil(maxY)
01273 
01274         # Measure and position the header.
01275         self.measureHeader(context, pcontext, playout)
01276         (minX, minY, maxX, maxY) = self.positionHeader(minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01277 
01278         # Measure and position the footer.
01279         self.measureFooter(context, pcontext, playout)
01280         (minX, minY, maxX, maxY) = self.positionFooter(minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01281 
01282         # Done calculating the bounding box.
01283         self.minX = minX
01284         self.minY = minY
01285         self.maxX = maxX
01286         self.maxY = maxY
01287 
01288         # Set the pie menu center.
01289         centerX = Round(-minX)
01290         centerY = Round(-minY)
01291         self.centerX = centerX
01292         self.centerY = centerY
01293 
01294         # Set the window position and size.
01295 
01296         width = maxX - minX
01297         height = maxY - minY
01298 
01299         if self.pieRings:
01300             # If it's a pie menu, then center in the middle of the menu.
01301             x = self.pinX + minX
01302             y = self.pinY + minY
01303         else:
01304             # If it's a linear menu, then center on its header, or just below the mouse if no header.
01305             x = self.pinX - (width / 2)
01306             y = self.pinY - (self.headerHeight / 2)
01307 
01308         self.x = x
01309         self.y = y
01310         self.width = width
01311         self.height =  height
01312 
01313         # Offset the header.
01314         self.headerX -= minX
01315         self.headerY -= minY
01316 
01317         # Offset the footer.
01318         self.footerX -= minX
01319         self.footerY -= minY
01320 
01321         # Offset the items.
01322         for item in visibleItems:
01323 
01324             x = item.x
01325             y = item.y
01326             x -= minX
01327             y -= minY
01328 
01329             item.x = x
01330             item.y = y
01331             item.finalX = x
01332             item.finalY = y
01333 
01334         # Done laying out the pie menu. (Whew!)
01335 
01336         # FIXME: Just do this after popup?
01337         print "AFTER LAYOUT", "WIDTH", self.width, "HEIGHT", self.height
01338         self.setWindowShape()
01339 
01340 
01341     def getRingClockwise(self, ring=0):
01342         clockwise = self.clockwise
01343         if type(clockwise) not in (type(()), type([])):
01344             clockwise = [clockwise]
01345         return clockwise[min(ring, len(clockwise) - 1)]
01346 
01347 
01348     def getRingInitialAngle(self, ring=0):
01349         initialAngle = self.initialAngle
01350         if type(initialAngle) not in (type(()), type([])):
01351             initialAngle = [initialAngle]
01352         return initialAngle[min(ring, len(initialAngle) - 1)]
01353 
01354 
01355     def measureHeader(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01356 
01357         header = self.header
01358 
01359         if header == None:
01360             self.headerWidth = 0
01361             self.headerHeight = 0
01362             return
01363 
01364         font = GetFont(self.headerFont)
01365 
01366         playout.set_font_description(font)
01367         playout.set_markup(header)
01368         width, height = playout.get_pixel_size()
01369 
01370         headerPadding = self.headerPadding
01371         width += 2 * headerPadding
01372         height += 2 * headerPadding
01373 
01374         self.headerWidth = width
01375         self.headerHeight = height
01376 
01377 
01378     def positionHeader(self, minX, minY, maxX, maxY):
01379 
01380         if self.header == None:
01381             headerX = 0
01382             headerY = 0
01383         else:
01384 
01385             headerWidth = self.headerWidth
01386             headerHeight = self.headerHeight
01387             headerMargin = self.headerMargin
01388 
01389             # Position the header horizontally.
01390             headerX = Floor(headerWidth / -2)
01391 
01392             # Make vertical space above the bounding box for the header.
01393             headerY = minY - headerHeight - self.headerGap
01394 
01395             minX = Floor(min(minX, headerX - headerMargin))
01396             maxX = Ceil(max(maxX, headerX + headerWidth + headerMargin))
01397 
01398             minY = Floor(min(minY, headerY - headerMargin))
01399             maxY = Ceil(max(maxY, headerY + headerHeight + headerMargin))
01400 
01401         self.headerX = headerX
01402         self.headerY = headerY
01403 
01404         return (minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01405 
01406 
01407     def measureFooter(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01408 
01409         footer = self.footer
01410         footerFixedHeight = self.footerFixedHeight
01411 
01412         if (footer == None) and (footerFixedHeight > 0):
01413             self.footerWidth = 0
01414             self.footerHeight = 0
01415             return
01416 
01417         if not footer:
01418             footer = ''
01419 
01420         font = GetFont(self.footerFont)
01421 
01422         playout.set_font_description(font)
01423         playout.set_markup(footer)
01424         width, height = playout.get_pixel_size()
01425 
01426         footerPadding = self.footerPadding
01427         width += 2 * footerPadding
01428         height += 2 * footerPadding
01429 
01430         if footerFixedHeight > 0:
01431             height = footerFixedHeight
01432 
01433         self.footerWidth = width
01434         self.footerHeight = height
01435 
01436 
01437     def positionFooter(self, minX, minY, maxX, maxY):
01438 
01439         if self.footer == None:
01440             footerX = 0
01441             footerY = 0
01442         else:
01443 
01444             footerWidth = self.footerWidth
01445             footerHeight = self.footerHeight
01446             footerMargin = self.footerMargin
01447 
01448             # Position the footer horizontally.
01449             footerX = Floor(footerWidth / -2)
01450 
01451             # Make vertical space above the bounding box for the footer.
01452             footerY = maxY + self.footerGap
01453 
01454             minX = Floor(min(minX, footerX - footerMargin))
01455             maxX = Ceil(max(maxX, footerX + footerWidth + footerMargin))
01456 
01457             minY = Floor(min(minY, footerY - footerMargin))
01458             maxY = Ceil(max(maxY, footerY + footerHeight + footerMargin))
01459 
01460             # If (always or) fixed height footer, then expand it out horizontally.
01461             #if True or self.footerFixedHeight:
01462             #    footerWidth = maxX - minX
01463             #    self.footerWidth = footerWidth
01464 
01465         self.footerX = footerX
01466         self.footerY = footerY
01467 
01468         return (minX, minY, maxX, maxY)
01469 
01470 
01471     def setWindowShape(self):
01472 
01473         #print "SETWINDOWSHAPE", self.x, self.y, self.width, self.height
01474         x = int(self.x)
01475         y = int(self.y)
01476         width = int(self.width)
01477         height = int(self.height)
01478 
01479         if ((x != self.winX) or
01480             (y != self.winY)):
01481             self.changePosition(x, y)
01482 
01483         if ((width != self.winWidth) or
01484             (height != self.winHeight)):
01485             self.changeSize(width, height)
01486 
01487 
01488     def changePosition(self, x, y):
01489 
01490         x = int(x)
01491         y = int(y)
01492 
01493         self.winX = x
01494         self.winY = y
01495 
01496         self.move(x, y)
01497 
01498 
01499     def changeSize(self, width, height):
01500 
01501         print "CHANGESIZE", width, height
01502 
01503         width = int(width)
01504         height = int(height)
01505 
01506         self.winWidth = width
01507         self.winHeight = height
01508 
01509         self.resize(width, height)
01510 
01511 
01512     def popUp(self, pinX, pinY, pinned=False):
01513 
01514         self.pinX = Floor(pinX + 0.5)
01515         self.pinY = Floor(pinY + 0.5)
01516         self.pinned = pinned
01517 
01518         self.curItem = -1
01519         self.curRingIndex = 0
01520         self.item = None
01521 
01522         if self.footerDescriptions:
01523             self.footer = self.neutralDescription
01524 
01525         self.invalidate()
01526         self.setWindowShape()
01527         self.redraw()
01528        
01529         self.show_all()
01530 
01531         d = self.d
01532        
01533         d.grab_add()
01534         d.grab_focus()
01535 
01536         #print "W", self.window
01537 
01538         print "POINTER_GRAB"
01539         gtk.gdk.pointer_grab(
01540             d.window,
01541             True,
01542             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_PRESS_MASK |
01543             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK |
01544             gtk.gdk.ENTER_NOTIFY_MASK |
01545             gtk.gdk.LEAVE_NOTIFY_MASK |
01546             gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_MASK)
01547 
01548         gtk.gdk.keyboard_grab(
01549             d.window,
01550             owner_events=True)
01551 
01552         self.handlePopUp()
01553 
01554         self.handleItemChanged()
01555 
01556 
01557     def popDown(self):
01558 
01559         self.d.grab_remove()
01560 
01561         print "POINTER_UNGRAB"
01562         gtk.gdk.pointer_ungrab()
01563 
01564         self.hide()
01565        
01566         self.handlePopDown()
01567 
01568         curItem = self.curItem
01569         if curItem != -1:
01570             item = self.visibleItems[curItem]
01571             item.handleLolite()
01572 
01573         self.curItem = -1
01574         self.curRingIndex = 0
01575         self.item = None
01576 
01577         # TODO: restore focus?
01578 
01579 
01580     def handleExpose(self, widget, event):
01581 
01582         self.draw(widget, event)
01583 
01584         return False
01585 
01586 
01587     def draw(self, widget, event):
01588 
01589         context = widget.window.cairo_create()
01590         pcontext = widget.create_pango_context()
01591         playout = pango.Layout(pcontext)
01592 
01593         self.setWindowShape()
01594 
01595         self.validate(context, pcontext, playout)
01596 
01597         context.rectangle(
01598             event.area.x,
01599             event.area.y,
01600             event.area.width,
01601             event.area.height)
01602         context.clip()
01603 
01604         self.drawBackground(context, pcontext, playout)
01605 
01606         self.drawHeader(context, pcontext, playout)
01607         self.drawFooter(context, pcontext, playout)
01608 
01609         curItem = self.curItem
01610         if curItem != -1:
01611             curItemObj = self.visibleItems[curItem]
01612         else:
01613             curItemObj = None
01614 
01615         curRingIndex = self.curRingIndex
01616         drawItemLater = None
01617 
01618         for item in self.items[::-1]:
01619             if item.index == curItem:
01620                 drawItemLater = item
01621             else:
01622                 # Deal with pie items specially.
01623                 if not item.linear:
01624 
01625                     # Don't draw pie labels inside of current ring.
01626                     if item.ringIndex < curRingIndex:
01627                         continue
01628 
01629                     # Draw pie labels outside of current ring transparently.
01630                     # Oops, we can't just set the opacity in the graphics state,
01631                     # so we would have to pass it into item.draw, but not yet. 
01632                     if item.ringIndex > curRingIndex:
01633                         opacity = 0.5
01634 
01635                 item.draw(context, pcontext, playout)
01636 
01637         # Draw the current item last so it overlaps all other items.
01638         if drawItemLater:
01639             drawItemLater.draw(context, pcontext, playout)
01640 
01641         self.drawOverlay(context, pcontext, playout)
01642 
01643 
01644     def drawBackground(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01645 
01646         centerX = self.centerX
01647         centerY = self.centerY
01648 
01649         context.rectangle(
01650             0,
01651             0,
01652             self.winWidth,
01653             self.winHeight)
01654         context.clip()
01655 
01656         fillColor = self.outsideFillColor
01657        
01658         if fillColor:
01659             context.rectangle(
01660                 0,
01661                 0,
01662                 self.winWidth,
01663                 self.winHeight)
01664 
01665             context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01666             context.fill()
01667 
01668         curItem = self.curItem
01669         if curItem != -1:
01670             curItemObj = self.visibleItems[curItem]
01671         else:
01672             curItemObj = None
01673 
01674         curRingIndex = self.curRingIndex
01675         pieRings = self.pieRings
01676         ringRadius = self.ringRadius
01677         neutralRadius = self.neutralRadius
01678         radius = self.radius
01679 
01680         if pieRings and radius:
01681 
01682             fillColor = self.backgroundFillColor
01683             strokeColor = self.backgroundStrokeColor
01684             edgeStrokeColor = self.edgeStrokeColor
01685 
01686             for ringIndex in range(len(pieRings) - 1, -1, -1):
01687                 ringItems = pieRings[ringIndex]
01688 
01689                 ########################################################################
01690                 # Draw the ring.
01691 
01692                 if ringIndex == 0:
01693                     innerRadius  = neutralRadius
01694                     outerRadius = radius
01695                 else:
01696                     innerRadius = radius + ((ringIndex - 1) * ringRadius)
01697                     outerRadius = radius + ((ringIndex) * ringRadius)
01698 
01699                 opacity = 1.0
01700                 if (ringIndex > curRingIndex):
01701                     opacity = 0.5
01702 
01703                 if ringIndex != curRingIndex:
01704 
01705                     # Don't draw rings inside the current ring.
01706                     if ringIndex < (curRingIndex - 1):
01707                         continue
01708 
01709                     if strokeColor:
01710 
01711                         context.arc(
01712                             centerX,
01713                             centerY,
01714                             radius + (ringIndex * ringRadius),
01715                             0,
01716                             TwoPI)
01717 
01718                         #strokeColorAlpha = strokeColor + (opacity,)
01719                         #context.set_source_rgba(*strokeColorAlpha)
01720                         context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01721                         context.stroke()
01722 
01723                 ########################################################################
01724                 # Draw a circle around the radius.
01725 
01726                 if fillColor or strokeColor or edgeStrokeColor:
01727 
01728                     if fillColor:
01729 
01730                         context.arc(
01731                             centerX,
01732                             centerY,
01733                             outerRadius,
01734                             0,
01735                             TwoPI)
01736 
01737                         #fillColorAlpha = fillColor + (opacity,)
01738                         #context.set_source_rgba(*fillColorAlpha)
01739                         context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01740                         context.fill()
01741 
01742                     if (edgeStrokeColor and
01743                         (len(ringItems) > 1)):
01744 
01745                         for item in ringItems:
01746 
01747                             edge1Dx = item.edge1Dx
01748                             edge1Dy = item.edge1Dy
01749 
01750                             context.move_to(
01751                                 centerX + (edge1Dx * neutralRadius),
01752                                 centerY + (edge1Dy * neutralRadius))
01753                             context.line_to(
01754                                 centerX + (edge1Dx * outerRadius),
01755                                 centerY + (edge1Dy * outerRadius))
01756 
01757                         # If the pie is sliced, and it's not a whole
01758                         # pie, then draw the last trailing edge.
01759 
01760                         pieSlice = self.pieSlice
01761                         if (pieSlice > 0) and (pieSlice < 1):
01762                             item = ringItems[-1]
01763 
01764                             edge2Dx = item.edge2Dx
01765                             edge2Dy = item.edge2Dy
01766 
01767                             context.move_to(
01768                                 centerX + (edge2Dx * neutralRadius),
01769                                 centerY + (edge2Dy * neutralRadius))
01770                             context.line_to(
01771                                 centerX + (edge2Dx * outerRadius),
01772                                 centerY + (edge2Dy * outerRadius))
01773 
01774                         #edgeStrokeColorAlpha = edgeStrokeColor + (opacity,)
01775                         #context.set_source_rgba(*edgeStrokeColorAlpha)
01776                         context.set_source_rgb(*edgeStrokeColor)
01777                         context.stroke()
01778 
01779                     if strokeColor:
01780 
01781                         context.arc(
01782                             centerX,
01783                             centerY,
01784                             outerRadius,
01785                             0,
01786                             TwoPI)
01787 
01788                         #strokeColorAlpha = strokeColor + (opacity,)
01789                         #context.set_source_rgba(*strokeColorAlpha)
01790                         context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01791                         context.stroke()
01792 
01793 
01794             ########################################################################
01795             # Draw a circle around the neutralRadius,
01796             # and hilite if no item selected.
01797 
01798             if curItem == -1:
01799                 fillColor = self.neutralHiliteFillColor
01800                 strokeColor = self.neutralHiliteStrokeColor
01801             else:
01802                 fillColor = self.neutralLoliteFillColor
01803                 strokeColor = self.neutralLoliteStrokeColor
01804 
01805             if fillColor or strokeColor:
01806 
01807                 if fillColor:
01808                     context.arc(
01809                         centerX,
01810                         centerY,
01811                         neutralRadius,
01812                         0,
01813                         TwoPI)
01814 
01815                     context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01816                     if strokeColor:
01817                         context.fill_preserve()
01818                     else:
01819                         context.fill()
01820 
01821                 if strokeColor:
01822                     context.arc(
01823                         centerX,
01824                         centerY,
01825                         neutralRadius,
01826                         0,
01827                         TwoPI)
01828 
01829                     context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01830                     context.stroke()
01831 
01832 
01833             ########################################################################
01834             # Draw the hilited slice.
01835            
01836             sliceHiliteFillColor = self.sliceHiliteFillColor
01837             sliceHiliteStrokeColor = self.sliceHiliteStrokeColor
01838 
01839             if ((sliceHiliteFillColor or sliceHiliteStrokeColor) and
01840                 curItemObj):
01841 
01842                 if curItemObj.linear:
01843                     pass # TODO: hilite linear items
01844                 else:
01845                     edge1Angle = curItemObj.edge1Angle
01846                     edge2Angle = curItemObj.edge2Angle
01847 
01848                     ringClockwise = self.getRingClockwise(curRingIndex)
01849 
01850                     if not ringClockwise:
01851                         temp = edge1Angle
01852                         edge1ang = edge2Angle
01853                         edge2ang = temp
01854 
01855                     # If outer ring, then extend highlight to screen edge.
01856                     if len(pieRings) == 1:
01857                         innerRadius = self.neutralRadius
01858                         outerRadius = self.radius + self.popoutRadius
01859                     else:
01860                         if curRingIndex == 0:
01861                             innerRadius = self.neutralRadius
01862                             outerRadius = self.radius
01863                         else:
01864                             innerRadius = self.radius + (ringRadius * (curRingIndex - 1))
01865                             outerRadius = self.radius + (ringRadius * curRingIndex)
01866                             if curRingIndex == (len(pieRings) - 1):
01867                                 outerRadius += self.popoutRadius
01868 
01869                     context.arc(
01870                         centerX,
01871                         centerY,
01872                         outerRadius,
01873                         edge1Angle,
01874                         edge2Angle)
01875 
01876                     context.arc_negative(
01877                         centerX,
01878                         centerY,
01879                         innerRadius,
01880                         edge2Angle,
01881                         edge1Angle)
01882 
01883                     context.close_path()
01884 
01885                 if fillColor:
01886                     context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteFillColor)
01887                     #context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteFillColor + (0.5,))
01888                     if strokeColor:
01889                         context.fill_preserve()
01890                     else:
01891                         context.fill()
01892 
01893                 if strokeColor:
01894                     context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteStrokeColor)
01895                     #context.set_source_rgb(*sliceHiliteStrokeColor + (0.5,))
01896                     context.stroke()
01897 
01898 
01899     def drawHeader(self, context, pcontext, playout):
01900 
01901         header = self.header
01902 
01903         if header == None:
01904             return
01905 
01906         x = self.headerX
01907         y = self.headerY
01908         width = self.headerWidth
01909         height = self.headerHeight
01910 
01911         context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01912 
01913         fillColor = self.headerFillColor
01914        
01915         if fillColor:
01916             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01917 
01918             context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01919             context.fill()
01920 
01921         strokeColor = self.headerStrokeColor
01922        
01923         if strokeColor:
01924             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01925 
01926             context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01927             context.stroke()
01928 
01929         textColor = self.headerTextColor
01930 
01931         if textColor:
01932 
01933             context.set_source_rgb(*textColor)
01934 
01935             font = GetFont(self.headerFont)
01936 
01937             playout.set_font_description(font)
01938             playout.set_markup(header)
01939 
01940             headerPadding = self.headerPadding
01941 
01942             context.move_to(
01943                 x + headerPadding,
01944                 y + headerPadding)
01945 
01946             context.show_layout(playout)
01947 
01948

01957         y = self.footerY
01958         width = self.footerWidth
01959         height = self.footerHeight
01960

01962

01964

01967 
01968             context.set_source_rgb(*fillColor)
01969             context.fill()
01970

01972        
01973         if strokeColor:
01974             context.rectangle(x, y, width, height)
01975 
01976             context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
01977             context.stroke()
01978

01980 
01981         if textColor:
01982 
01983             context.set_source_rgb(*textColor)
01984 
01985             font = GetFont(self.footerFont)
01986 
01987             playout.set_font_description(font)
01988             playout.set_markup(footer)
01989 
01990             footerPadding = self.footerPadding
01991 
01992             context.move_to(
01993                 x + footerPadding,
01994                 y + footerPadding)
01995 
01996             context.show_layout(playout)
01997 
01998 
01999     def drawOverlay(self, context, pcontext, playout):
02000 
02001         strokeColor = self.outsideStrokeColor
02002        
02003         if strokeColor:
02004             context.rectangle(
02005                 0,
02006                 0,
02007                 self.winWidth,
02008                 self.winHeight)
02009 
02010             context.set_source_rgb(*strokeColor)
02011             context.stroke()
02012 
02013 
02014     def setFooter(self, footer):
02015         self.footer = footer
02016 
02017 
02018     def redraw(self):
02019         self.d.queue_draw()
02020 
02021 
02022     def trackMouseMove(self, cx, cy):
02023 
02024         curX = self.curX
02025         curY = self.curY
02026 
02027         if ((cx == curX) and
02028             (cy == curY)):
02029             return
02030        
02031         self.lastX = curX
02032         self.lastY = curY
02033         self.curX = cx
02034         self.curY = cy
02035 
02036         # Track the selection based on the cursor offset from the menu center.
02037 
02038         dx = cx - self.centerX
02039         dy = cy - self.centerY
02040 
02041         # Add in and clear out any virtual mouse motion.
02042         dx += self.mouseDeltaX
02043         dy += self.mouseDeltaY
02044         self.mouseDeltaX = 0
02045         self.mouseDeltaY = 0
02046 
02047         self.dx = dx
02048         self.dy = dy
02049 
02050         self.distance = (
02051             Sqrt(
02052                 (dx * dx) +
02053                 (dy * dy)))
02054 
02055         if self.distance <= 0:
02056             self.direction = 0
02057         else:
02058             self.direction = NormalizeAngleRad(Atan2(-dy, dx))
02059 
02060         visibleItems = self.visibleItems
02061         itemCount = len(visibleItems)
02062 
02063         self.handleMotion()
02064 
02065         # If there aren't any items, there's nothing to do.
02066         if itemCount == 0:
02067             return
02068 
02069         newItem = -1
02070         lastItem = self.curItem
02071 
02072         self.lastItem = lastItem
02073 
02074         #print "trackMouseMove", "cx", cx, "cy", cy, "dx", dx, "dy", dy
02075 
02076         pieRings = self.pieRings
02077 
02078         curRingIndex = (
02079             max(0,
02080                 min(len(pieRings) - 1,
02081                     Floor(
02082                         (self.distance - self.radius) /
02083                         self.ringRadius) + 1)))
02084 
02085         self.curRingIndex = curRingIndex
02086         curItemEntered = -1
02087 
02088         for i in range(0, itemCount):
02089             it = self.items[i]
02090 
02091             # Ignore the item if
02092             # there is more than one ring,
02093             # the item is a pie item,
02094             # and it's not in the currently selected ring.
02095             if ((len(pieRings) > 1) and
02096                 (not it.linear) and
02097                 (it.ringIndex != curRingIndex)):
02098                 continue
02099 
02100             x0 = it.finalX
02101             y0 = it.finalY
02102             x1 = x0 + it.width
02103             y1 = y0 + it.height
02104             #print "trackMouseMove ITEM", "i", i, "cx", cx, "cy", cy, "x0", x0, "y0", y0, "x1", x1, "y1", y1
02105 
02106             if ((cx >= x0) and (cx < x1) and
02107                 (cy >= y0) and (cy < y1)):
02108                 #print "ENTERED", i
02109                 curItemEntered = i
02110                 break
02111 
02112         if curItemEntered != -1:
02113             newItem = curItemEntered
02114         else:
02115             if (pieRings and
02116                 (self.distance > self.neutralRadius)):
02117 
02118                 ringItems = pieRings[curRingIndex]
02119                 ringItemCount = len(ringItems)
02120 
02121                 pieSlice = self.pieSlice
02122                 pieSubtend = TwoPI
02123                 if pieSlice > 0:
02124                     pieSubtend *= pieSlice
02125 
02126                 if ringItemCount == 1:
02127                     newItem = ringItems[0].index
02128                 else:
02129 
02130                     if ringItemCount > 0:
02131                         ringInitialAngle = self.getRingInitialAngle(curRingIndex)
02132                         ang = DegToRad(ringInitialAngle)
02133 
02134                         ringClockwise = self.getRingClockwise(curRingIndex)
02135 
02136                         if pieSlice == 0:
02137                             twist = pieSubtend / ringItemCount / 2.0
02138                         else:
02139                             twist = 0
02140 
02141                         if ringClockwise:
02142                             ang = ang - self.direction + twist
02143                         else:
02144                             ang = ang + self.direction - twist
02145 
02146                         ang = NormalizeAngleRad(ang)
02147 
02148                         newPieItem = Floor((ang / pieSubtend) * ringItemCount)
02149 
02150                         if newPieItem < 0:
02151                             newPieItem = -1
02152                         elif newPieItem >= ringItemCount:
02153                             newPieItem = -1
02154 
02155                         if newPieItem == -1:
02156                             newItem = -1
02157                         else:
02158                             newItem = ringItems[newPieItem].index
02159 
02160         # Now we've figured out the selected newItem,
02161         # so update the display if necessary.
02162 
02163         if newItem >= len(self.visibleItems):
02164             newItem = itemCount - 1
02165 
02166         if newItem != lastItem:
02167             self.curItem = newItem
02168 
02169             item = None
02170             for i in range(0, itemCount):
02171                 it = self.items[i]
02172                 hilited = (i == newItem)
02173                 if hilited:
02174                     item = it
02175                     break
02176             self.item = item
02177 
02178             if self.footerDescriptions:
02179                 footer = None
02180                 if item == None:
02181                     footer = self.neutralDescription
02182                 else:
02183                     footer = item.description
02184                 self.setFooter(footer)
02185 
02186             now = time.time()
02187 
02188             if lastItem != -1:
02189                 it = self.items[lastItem]
02190                 if it.enterTime == 0:
02191                     it.enterTime = now
02192                 it.exitTime = now
02193                 elapsed = now - it.enterTime
02194                 it.totalTime += elapsed
02195                 it.handleLolite()
02196 
02197             if newItem != -1:
02198                 it = self.items[newItem]
02199                 it.enterTime = now
02200                 it.handleHilite()
02201 
02202             self.redraw()
02203 
02204             self.handleItemChanged()
02205 
02206         if newItem != -1:
02207             item = self.items[newItem]
02208             item.handleMotion()
02209 
02210

02215         pass

02264         pass
02265 
02266 
02267     def trackMouseUp(self):
02268 
02269         if ((self.curItem == -1) and
02270             (not self.pinned)):
02271             self.pinned = True
02272             return
02273 
02274         self.doAction()
02275         self.popDown()
02276 
02277 
02278     def doAction(self):
02279 
02280         curItem = self.curItem
02281         if curItem == -1:
02282             self.handleCancel()
02283             return
02284 
02285         item = self.visibleItems[curItem]
02286        
02287         #print "DOACTION", self, self.curItem, item, item.label
02288 
02289         subPie = item.subPie
02290         if subPie:
02291             x = self.curX + self.x
02292             y = self.curY + self.y
02293             subPie.popUp(x, y, True)
02294             self.handleSubmenu()
02295         else:
02296             self.handleAction()
02297             item.handleAction()
02298 
02299 
02300 ########################################################################
02301 
02302 
02303 class LinearMenu(PieMenu):
02304 
02305     def __init__(
02306         self,
02307         **args):
02308 
02309         PieMenu.__init__(
02310             self,
02311             maxPieItems=0,
02312             **args)
02313 
02314

02325             self,
02326             maxPieItems=1.0e+6,
02327             **args)
